column4: It took more than three weeks before my x-session started acting stupid.  Unlike Windows which happens in about four hours.  It was so nice to simply restart x as opposed to restarting the whole frickin' machine.  What I want to know is what caused it to go buggy though?
you can hit ctrl+alt+backspace to restart X but ram is not freed by running apps
restarting X after closing all of the apps seems to have fixed the issue.
id reboot then but im sure theres a better way
